com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core

Class SubmoveElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.SubmoveElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompoundEdge, Submove, Iterator<Submove>

    public final class SubmoveElement
extends Object
implements Submove
    A SubmoveElement is a Submove in a sequence of Submoves that comprise a Move.

    The first element of any such sequence is always the SubmoveHead.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb.CompoundEdge

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubmoveElement

        public SubmoveElement(Vertex origin,
                      Polyline stroke,
                      Graph currentState,
                      float vertexGlueRadius)
        Creates a new Submove.

        This constructor uses the default bounding box rectangle: 

         new Rectangle(
     0,
     0,
     Float.POSITIVE_INFINITY,
     Float.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 )
        Parameters:
        origin - the Graph Vertex in which this Submove begins
        stroke - the polyline approximation of the move stroke
        currentState - the game state before this Submove
        vertexGlueRadius - the Vertex glue radius, used to auto-complete this Submove when near a sprout

      • SubmoveElement

        public SubmoveElement(Vertex origin,
                      Polyline stroke,
                      Graph currentState,
                      float vertexGlueRadius,
                      Rectangle gameBounds)
        Creates a new Submove.
        Parameters:
        origin - the Graph Vertex in which this Submove begins
        stroke - the polyline approximation of the move stroke
        currentState - the game state before this Submove
        vertexGlueRadius - the Vertex glue radius, used to auto-complete this Submove when near a sprout
        gameBounds - any Submove that is drawn outside of gameBounds is invalid

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Description copied from interface: Submove
        Checks if this Submove is completed.

        A Submove is completed if it intersects a cobweb or direction().to() connects to a sprout.

        Specified by:
        isCompleted in interface Submove
        Returns:
        true if this Submove is completed

      • isReadyToRender

        public boolean isReadyToRender()
        Description copied from interface: Submove
        Checks if this Submove can be rendered.
        Specified by:
        isReadyToRender in interface Submove
        Returns:
        true if enough of this Submove has already been drawn that it can be rendered

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Description copied from interface: Submove
        Checks if this Submove is valid.

        A Submove is valid if:

        • it doesn't cross itself
        • it doesn't cross any of the already drawn moves
        • it is not connected to an already dead sprout
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface Submove
        Returns:
        true if this Submove is valid
